resume.name: TEVIN PRINGLE

experience.title: Graduate Research Assistant
responsibilities: Developed stochastic models to evaluate the impact of mortality trend shifts on life insurance pricing.
Performed multivariate survival analysis using R on longitudinal demographic datasets.
Collaborated with faculty to simulate extreme weather event frequencies and their corresponding impact on property and casualty loss reserves.

experience.title: Lead Researcher - Actuarial Capstone
responsibilities: Conducted a comparative analysis of predictive modeling techniques for high-frequency, low-severity insurance claims.
Leveraged SQL to query large relational databases and integrated Python scripts for automated data cleaning and feature engineering.
Presented research findings on the correlation between macroeconomic indicators and credit insurance risk to the local actuarial society chapter.

skills: Proficient in R, SQL, and Python

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
